title: ‘Ready to make any sacrifice for the people’ – Sri Lankan PM Mahinda Rajapaksa
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa on Monday (9) said that he is ready to make any sacrifice for the people.

The Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna Local Government Members Forum led hundreds of Mahinda Rajapaksa supporters to Temple Trees on Monday (9) to urge Rajapaksa NOT to step down from the post of Prime Minister.
‘Ready to make any sacrifice for the people’ – Sri Lankan PM Mahinda Rajapaksa
‘If the Prime Minister resigns it would create a political crisis,’ – Johnston
15,000 LP Gas cylinders to Colombo, other major cities on Monday (9) & Tuesday (10)
